attributes.action: make it law that no alcohol should be consumed before driving! i am 17 and have lost many friends with a 'drink' in them!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I feel very strongly about this issue. It has been proven that one drink can influence your driving so why is it still legal. It is difficult to know when you r over the limit..therefore leading to accidents. please please sign this before more are lost on the roads

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
